attributes.additional_details:
The UK party political System is broken and obsolete...

The persons signing this petition call for the government to debate it's own dissolution within a realistic timeframe to be replaced with a true democracy where individuals votes count.
Every person eligible to vote should be issued with an iPhone or similar cost effective devise to enable e-votes to take place on any issue effecting our lives.

The current system is unfair and undemocratic.  The millions saved in MP costs could be used to fund such a system.
